topic.title: Configuring a JavaScript IDE for Plugin Development

body.p:
When developing a plugin for , WebStorm (a commercial IDE for JavaScript development) can be used to edit JavaScript files. To configure WebStorm to display code completion hints for the API, follow these steps:
Go to File Settings .
Open the Languages & Frameworks > JavaScript > Libraries section.
Click Add and use Web Author for the name.
Click the (+) button near the first list and choose Attach File(s).
Choose the folder where the API definition files are located. This folder is in your installation folder (in tomcat/webapps/oxygen-xml-web-author/WEB-INF/jsapi/).
